title: Wondershare DreamStream 1.1.6.3 + Patch MPT + Patch REiS
description:
================
[INFO:]
================
Wondershare DreamStream 1.1.6.3 + Patch MPT + Patch REiS | 41.5 MB

HD Streaming From PC to TV in One Click. Wireless Enjoyment of full HD Movies and Music without a Smart TV. Stream all of your media from your Windows PC and tablet, directly to your TV, via your Google Chromecast. Watch your favourite shows, movies and playlists, directly from the program interface with no need to launch an internet browser. DreamStream makes enjoying your media collection as simple as the click of a button.

Stream your Favourite Movies, Music & TV Series

Stream your entire collection in High Definition, without transferring your videos, music & more to an external hard drive, USB or HDMI. Enjoy a single solution that allows you to stream, manage and enjoy your content without the use of an internet browser.

Support for 20+ Media Formats

Dreamstream supports a huge variety of file formats eliminating the need to convert your entire collection due to file type limitations. DreamStream Supported Files - Video: MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, MPG, WMV, MTS, FLV, M2TS, 3G2, 3GP, DIVX, RM, RMVB, VOB, ASF, TS, DV, F4V, OGV, TOD, TP, TRP, WEBM. Audio: MP3, AAC, WMA, APE, FLAC, OGG, M4A, WAV, AC3, MP2.

Automatic Media Management & Built-in Player

Automatically manage your collection with auto-indexing; DreamStream finds and sorts your media files saved on your hard drive and populates them into the Dreamstream library. Manage your entire collection and even enjoy your content on the go, with your Windows laptop or tablet, by utilizing the built-in media player.



Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
Language : English


================
[INSTALL NOTES:]
================

1. Read "Flaubert Release-Readme!" into folder

NOTE: Keygens, patches, Activators, Cracks, Loaders etc. are always scanned with Kaspersky Internet Security 2014 Latest Version to Avoid Virus
     issues.
